evolutionmod:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
evolutionmod:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next !M! basic πStrike or Defend you play will Adapt with your next Gene.
Adapt a basic πStrike or Defend with your two rightmost  Genes, ignoring duplicates. NL Retain.

evolutionmod:Evolution.NAME: Evolution
evolutionmod:Evolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evolve !M! randomized when drawn and at the end of your turn. NL Retain.

evolutionmod:HoofKick.NAME: Hoof Kick
evolutionmod:HoofKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Evolve a [#B06050]Centaur[] gene

evolutionmod:WindUp.NAME: Wind up
evolutionmod:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Adapt this with a Centaur gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Stampede.NAME: Stampede
evolutionmod:Stampede.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL Evolve a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Brambles.NAME: Brambles
evolutionmod:Brambles.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Gain !M! Brambles NL Evolve a [#60B040]Plant[] gene

evolutionmod:VineLash.NAME: Vine lash
evolutionmod:VineLash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Brambles. Adapt this with a [#60B040]Plant[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times. Deal damage equal to your your Thorns and Brambles.

evolutionmod:Constrict.NAME: Constrict
evolutionmod:Constrict.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply Constricted equal to your Thorns and Brambles to an enemy NL Evolve a [#60B040]Plant[] gene
evolutionmod:Constrict.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply Constricted equal to your Thorns and Brambles to all enemies NL Evolve a [#60B040]Plant[] gene

evolutionmod:TalonStrike.NAME: Talon strike
evolutionmod:TalonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Evolve a [#FFFF80]Harpy[] gene

evolutionmod:TakeOff.NAME: Take Off
evolutionmod:TakeOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL draw 1 card NL Adapt this with a [#FFFF80]Harpy[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.NAME: Feather Storm
evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each 2 cards in your hand NL Evolve a [#FFFF80]Harpy[] gene

evolutionmod:WaterBolt.NAME: Water bolt
evolutionmod:WaterBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Apply !M! Weak NL Evolve a [#5252FF]Merfolk[] gene

evolutionmod:WaveCrash.NAME: Wave Crash
evolutionmod:WaveCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Evolve a [#5252FF]Merfolk[] gene

evolutionmod:Dive.NAME: Dive
evolutionmod:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL Adapt this with a [#5252FF]Merfolk[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Drown.NAME: Drown
evolutionmod:Drown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL At the end of this turn the enemy will take your block as damage NL Evolve a [#5252FF]Merfolk[] gene

evolutionmod:Charm.NAME: Charm
evolutionmod:Charm.DESCRIPTION: reduce the strength of the enemy by !M! until the end of the turn NL Evolve a [#F04040]Succubus[] gene

evolutionmod:Strip.NAME: Strip
evolutionmod:Strip.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Adapt this with a [#F04040]Succubus[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Seduce.NAME: Seduce
evolutionmod:Seduce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Give yourself and the enemy Block equal to the unblocked damage NL Evolve a [#F04040]Succubus[] gene

evolutionmod:FlameStrike.NAME: Flame Strike
evolutionmod:FlameStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Evolve a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene.

evolutionmod:Fireballs.NAME: Fireballs
evolutionmod:Fireballs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Adapt this with a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene.

evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.NAME: Channel magic
evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Lavafolk Form until your next turn. NL Adapt this with a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
evolutionmod:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !M! Eruption NL Evolve a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene.

evolutionmod:DrainMana.NAME: Drain Mana
evolutionmod:DrainMana.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards NL Evolve a [#50FFFF]Lymean[] gene.

evolutionmod:Purify.NAME: Purify
evolutionmod:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 to !M! cards. NL Adapt this with a [#50FFFF]Lymean[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Aegis.NAME: Aegis
evolutionmod:Aegis.DESCRIPTION: Give Intangible to everyone. NL When you play an attack, Exhaust Aegis. NL Evolve a [#50FFFF]Lymean[] gene.
evolutionmod:Aegis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give Intangible to everyone. NL When you play an attack, discard Aegis. NL Evolve a [#50FFFF]Lymean[] gene.

evolutionmod:GatherFood.NAME: Gather Food
evolutionmod:GatherFood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evolve an [#A0A020]Insect[] gene.

evolutionmod:Hivemind.NAME: Hivemind
evolutionmod:Hivemind.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Drone to your hand. NL Adapt this with an Insect gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.
evolutionmod:Hivemind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Drones to your hand. NL Adapt this with an Insect gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Incubate.NAME: Incubate
evolutionmod:Incubate.DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! Drones will be upgraded. NL Evolve an Insect gene.

evolutionmod:ClawSlash.NAME: Claw slash
evolutionmod:ClawSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Evolve a [#B06060]Beast[] gene.

evolutionmod:HeightenedSenses.NAME: Heightened senses
evolutionmod:HeightenedSenses.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way which are not Attacks. NL Adapt this with a Beast gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Rush.NAME: Rush
evolutionmod:Rush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random Strike from your deck on the same target. NL Evolve a [#B06060]Beast[] gene.
evolutionmod:Rush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a random Strike from your deck and play a copy on the same target. NL Evolve a [#B06060]Beast[] gene.

evolutionmod:Regenerate.NAME: Regenerate
evolutionmod:Regenerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a random Status. NL Evolve a [#B0F0B0]Lizard[] gene.

evolutionmod:PoisonFangs.NAME: Poison Fangs
evolutionmod:PoisonFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Adapt this with a Lizard gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.NAME: Poison Spit
evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply !M! Poison. NL Evolve a Lizard gene.

evolutionmod:ShadowShift.NAME: Shadow Shift
evolutionmod:ShadowShift.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded. NL Evolve a Ghost gene.

evolutionmod:CursedTouch.NAME: Cursed Touch
evolutionmod:CursedTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Adapt this with a Ghost gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:DrainCurse.NAME: Drain Curse
evolutionmod:DrainCurse.DESCRIPTION: Remove all but 1 Weak from the enemy. NL Gain !M! times that much Block. NL Evolve a Ghost gene.

evolutionmod:SirenSong.NAME: Siren Song
evolutionmod:SirenSong.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Evolve a Merfolk gene and a Succubus gene. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:BlackCat.NAME: Black Cat
evolutionmod:BlackCat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Evolve a Beast gene and a Ghost gene. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:Toxin.NAME: Toxin
evolutionmod:Toxin.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Evolve a Plant gene and a Lizard gene. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:Salamander.NAME: Salamander
evolutionmod:Salamander.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Evolve a Lavafolk gene and a Lizard gene.

evolutionmod:Blessing.NAME: Benediction
evolutionmod:Blessing.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random Curse from your deck. NL Gain !M! Artifact NL Evolve a Lymean gene and a Ghost gene.
evolutionmod:Blessing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Exhaust a random Curse from your deck. NL Gain !M! Artifact NL Evolve a Lymean gene and a Ghost gene.

evolutionmod:Symbiotes.NAME: Symbiotes
evolutionmod:Symbiotes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Brambles and twice as much Block the first time you play a Drone each turn. NL Evolve a Plant gene and an Insect gene.

evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting strike
evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first !M! genes.

evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.NAME: Shifting guard
evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger your first !M! genes.

evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.NAME: Shifting power
evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Trigger your first !M! genes.

evolutionmod:AquaticForm.NAME: Aquatic form
evolutionmod:AquaticForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the Block and Poison of Merfolk and Lizard Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:MagicForm.NAME: Magic form
evolutionmod:MagicForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage and Block of Lavafolk and Lymean Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:StrengthForm.NAME: Strength form
evolutionmod:StrengthForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of Centaur and Beast Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:Drone.NAME: Drone
evolutionmod:Drone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

evolutionmod:Offbeat.NAME: Offbeat
evolutionmod:Offbeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: hits twice

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.

mysticmodref:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmodref:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[]. Deal !D! damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] amounts.
